title: 1960s Variety Show Acts
description: Remember the dazzling performers and unforgettable acts that graced 1960s variety shows?

questions.question: Which iconic variety show host introduced The Beatles to American audiences on February 9, 1964?
Which Italian crooner hosted his own laid-back variety show starting in 1965?
Which comedy duo appeared regularly on 'The Ed Sullivan Show' with their mouse puppet Topo Gigio?
Which Motown group performed 'My Girl' on numerous variety shows in the mid-1960s?
Flip Wilson became famous for what female character on his variety show?
Which comedy show featured the catchphrase 'Sock it to me!' in the late 1960s?
Which folk-singing brothers had their CBS variety show canceled over political content disputes?
On 'The Ed Sullivan Show', which plate-spinning act became one of the most popular recurring performers?
Which singing group famously appeared on Ed Sullivan performing 'I Want to Hold Your Hand'?
Which comedian was known for his silent, deadpan comedy on variety shows and often smashed watermelons?
Carol Burnett's variety show debuted in what year?
Which young singer became a regular on 'The Andy Williams Show' as part of the Osmond Brothers?
Which ventriloquist and his dummy were frequent guests on 1960s variety shows, with the dummy named 'Knucklehead Smiff'?
Which famous comedian hosted a variety show and was known for putting on elaborate, outrageous sketches as 'Mr. Television'?
Which husband-and-wife comedy team starred in their own 1960s variety show before gaining fame on 'Laugh-In'?
